    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        A id that identifies this task (or a group of tasks). This doesn't have to be unique among all tasks. It's used to register TaskListener on this id that will receive events solely for tasks with a certain id.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Task<V,C>
        Returns:

      • done

        public void done(V value)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        This method is invoked once Task.execute(Tracker) has successfully finished and is called on the UI thread.

      • failed

        public void failed(Throwable cause)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        This method is invoked if Task.execute(Tracker) threw an exception. This method is executed on the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        failed in interface Task<V,C>

      • process

        public void process(List<C> chunks)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Calls going to Tracker.publish(Object[]) from within Task.execute(Tracker) are routed to this method. This method is invoked on the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        process in interface Task<V,C>
